DialogueText.Text: Well hey! Was wonderin when I'd see another face around here. Seems like everybody's off doing... something or another. Kinda strange, huh? Here's usually quite the busy place. I did manage get a bit of extra shut-eye though.
I can't say I'm too sure. The Orator called some sorta meeting upstairs, but that stuffs none of my business. Sounded like quite the big deal though.
I could hear a lotta voices up above me, and then all of a sudden there was this loud sort of roar... After that, everything went quiet. Haven't heard a peep since!

Haven't seen a soul since... Well, besides Seamstress; she stopped by to check in. Haven't even seen the Orator! Between you and me, I think something big happened; something to do with that 'Great One' those Bishops are always on about.
